originalText.text:
** best dry cleaner in Murray Hill **

There are a dozen dry cleaner options in my area and I've tried almost all of them. This is by far the best. Always friendly, great prices, and have never messed up any of my clothes (something I can't say for the other cleaners I've been to). They always remember my name, give my dog a treat, and ask how my baby is doing. Professional and kind

No question, the best cleaners in Murray Hill with the best prices

There are a dozen dry cleaner options in my area and I've tried almost all of them. This is by far the best. Always friendly, great prices, and have never messed up any of my clothes (something I can't say for the other cleaners I've been to). They always remember my name, give my dog a treat, and ask how my baby is doing. Professional and kind

originalText.text:
Not so expert tailoring. Grant it I did ask for something outside of the mundane. I needed a dress shortened as I am a fairly petite lady. But instead of cutting the bottom I wanted the skirt moved up to create a more flattering waistline for myself. I was told, "It impossible!" and turned away. I just got back from another dry cleaners that accepted my odd request and did a stellar job. I love the new waistline! Turns out it was VERY possible.
Though I must give them some points for knowing their limits. I'd hate it if they accepted the job then botched it up. I would just have appreciated more honesty, not lies about it being physically impossible.

originalText.text: My favorite cry cleaner in the area! Great place to go for quick dry cleaning at a good price. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I went to do dry clean a lot of times until once I got my pants and coats back and found them are still dirty…..

text.text: I went to do dry clean a lot of times until once I got my pants and coats back and found them are still dirty…..

originalText.text: Was recommended to their service by someone I follow on IG and couldn’t be happier to support a small business that puts so much care into their work. Got three pair of pants tailored - hemmed and tapered and I’m happy to go out of my way from Queens!
